attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop instructing primary care trusts to "privatise" GP services into polyclinics and urgently consider the impact of such a policy on rural communities with little or no public transport.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
